info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Salt Lake...northwestern Utah and east central Tooele Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cedar Fort, or 18 miles southeast of Tooele, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Jordan, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Bluffdale, Cedar Fort, Camp Williams, Bingham Canyon Mine, Saratoga Springs, Fairfield and Copperton. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 282 and 290. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
